style: professional dark-mode conversion funnel visualization, OG social card format
scene: A dark analytics dashboard showing a conversion funnel on the left narrowing from impressions to clicks to conversions, with the conversion rate 6.51% highlighted in gold (#d79f1e). On the right, a CTR bar chart showing dramatic improvement from 0.27% (dim red) to 25.72% (bright green). Clean grid background. Quote marks subtly in the background suggesting UGC content. Dark charcoal background (#0a0a0a). Modern, results-driven aesthetic.
